font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 每日的,平凡的： everyday; commonplace
【例】 plagued by a quotidian coughing 每天被咳嗽困扰
【近】 commonplace, everyday, frequent, ordinary, routine, ubiquitous
【反】 remarkable, striking, extraordinary, unusual, rare, infrequent, seldom 不平常的
【记】 from quote: "how many? which in order or number?" + dies "day"
